Player History
Drafted in 10th round, 157th overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/2015, off George Davenport (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2015, off Carl Reyna (BRO)...

Hit for the cycle against Boston on 6/16/2016...

Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2016, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 16 RBI...
